name: Dating Simon
description:
Hi!
This game is the product of a one-day gamejam at the ENJMIN (Angoulême, France), made using the Unity engine. The theme was "Cognitive Perception".

Dating Simon is a game that plays with your perception through a dating simulation. We mostly use the Stroop effect and the Simon effect but there's also Inattentional blindness involved.

You can play it with your keyboard or with an Xbox gamepad on PC. You will have to push the right button according to the displayed symbol. The faster you push the right button, the more you score points.

- The Dating Simon team -
Adrien Ronté : https://twitter.com/Disc0rde
